00065 #ifndef __MTOUCHCVD_MACROLIBRARY_H
00066 #define __MTOUCHCVD_MACROLIBRARY_H
00067 
00068 #include "mTouch_macroLibrary_common.h"
00069 
00070 
00071 #undef  SAVE_STATE()
00072 #define SAVE_STATE()     
00073 #undef  RESTORE_STATE()
00074 #define RESTORE_STATE()  
00075 // The Enhanced Midrange Core does not require saving/restoring state on entering
00076 // the ISR, so these macros are undefined.
00077 
00078 
00079 #define CVD_RS_SET_GODONE()                                                         \
00080     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_ADCON0)               );  /*                  */  \
00081     asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_ADCON0))   ",1");  /* GO_nDONE = 1;    */ 
00082     
00083 
00084 
00085 // Sensor tris set using FSR0
00086 // ADCON0 loaded directly
00087 #define CVD_RSC_FSR0(current_channel, pin)                                                              \
00088     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_ADCON0)                       );  /*                              */  \
00089     asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(current_channel)               );  /*                              */  \
00090     asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF0)    "," ___mkstr(pin)   );  /* Set the sensor to an input   */  \
00091     _NOP_DELAY(CVD_SWITCH_DELAY);                                                                       \
00092     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_ADCON0))               );  /* ADC Mux --> Sensor           */  
00093 
00094     
00095     
00096     
00097     
00098     
00099 // GUARD SENSOR - IO
00100 #if defined(CVD_GUARD_IO_ENABLED) || defined(MTOUCH_UNIQUE_GUARD_OPTIONS)
00101 
00102     // Assumes: FSR0 is Sensor TRIS
00103     //          FSR1 is Guard LAT
00104     #define CVD_RSCa_FSR0_gFSR1SET(current_channel, pin)                                                            \
00105         asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_ADCON0)                               );  /*                              */  \
00106         asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(current_channel)                       );  /*                              */  \
00107         asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF1)    "," ___mkstr(CVD_GUARD_PIN) );  /*                              */  \
00108         asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF0)    "," ___mkstr(pin)           );  /* Set the sensor to an input   */  \
00109         _NOP_DELAY(CVD_SWITCH_DELAY);                                                                               \
00110         asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_ADCON0))                       );  /* ADC Mux --> Sensor           */  
00111         
00112     #define CVD_RSCb_FSR0_gFSR1CLR(current_channel, pin)                                                            \
00113         asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_ADCON0)                               );  /*                              */  \
00114         asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(current_channel)                       );  /*                              */  \
00115         asm("bcf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF1)    "," ___mkstr(CVD_GUARD_PIN) );  /*                              */  \
00116         asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF0)    "," ___mkstr(pin)           );  /* Set the sensor to an input   */  \
00117         _NOP_DELAY(CVD_SWITCH_DELAY);                                                                               \
00118         asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_ADCON0))                       );  /* ADC Mux --> Sensor           */  
00119         
00120     // FSR0 = Sensor TRIS
00121     // FSR1 = Guard IO PORT
00122     #define CVD_RSP_FSR0sTRIS_FSR1gLAT(sensorTris)                                                      \
00123         asm("movlw LOW  "   ___mkstr(__paste(_,CVD_GUARD_PORT)) );  /*                              */  \
00124         asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(_FSR1L)            );          /*                              */  \
00125         asm("movlw HIGH "   ___mkstr(__paste(_,CVD_GUARD_PORT)) );  /*                              */  \
00126         asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(_FSR1H)            );          /*                              */  \
00127         asm("movlw LOW  "   ___mkstr(sensorTris)        );          /*                              */  \
00128         asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(_FSR0L)            );          /*                              */  \
00129         asm("movlw HIGH "   ___mkstr(sensorTris)        );          /*                              */  \
00130         asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(_FSR0H)            );          /*                              */  
00131         
00132 #endif 
00133  
00134 
00135 // GUARD SENSOR - DACOUT PIN
00136 #if defined(CVD_GUARD_DACOUT_ENABLED) || defined(MTOUCH_UNIQUE_GUARD_OPTIONS)
00137     #if !defined(CVD_FORCE_REF_DAC) && (MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS != 1)
00138     
00139         // Assumes: FSR0 is Sensor TRIS
00140         //          FSR1 is ADCON0
00141         //          DAC is not reference source
00142         #define CVD_RSCa_FSR0_FSR1ADC_gDAC(current_channel, pin)                                                        \
00143             asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_DACCON1)                              );  /*                              */  \
00144             asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(CVD_GUARD_DACCON0_A & 0xDF)            );  /* Clear DACOUT enable bit      */  \
00145             asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_DACCON0))                      );  /* Configure DAC                */  \
00146             asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(CVD_GUARD_DACCON1_A)                   );  /*                              */  \
00147             asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_DACCON1))                      );  /* DAC output level = 1/3 VDD   */  \
00148             asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(current_channel)                       );  /*                              */  \
00149             asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF0)    "," ___mkstr(pin)           );  /* Set the sensor to an input   */  \
00150             _NOP_DELAY(CVD_SWITCH_DELAY);                                                                               \
00151             asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(_INDF1)                                );  /* ADC Mux --> Sensor           */  \
00152             asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_DACCON0))  ",5"                );  /* DAC Output Enable            */
00153             
00154         #define CVD_RSCb_FSR0_FSR1ADC_gDAC(current_channel, pin)                                                        \
00155             asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_DACCON1)                              );  /*                              */  \
00156             asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(CVD_GUARD_DACCON0_B & 0xDF)            );  /* Clear DACOUT enable bit      */  \
00157             asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_DACCON0))                      );  /* Configure DAC                */  \
00158             asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(CVD_GUARD_DACCON1_B)                   );  /*                              */  \
00159             asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_DACCON1))                      );  /* DAC output level = 2/3 VDD   */  \
00160             asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(current_channel)                       );  /*                              */  \
00161             asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF0)    "," ___mkstr(pin)           );  /* Set the sensor to an input   */  \
00162             _NOP_DELAY(CVD_SWITCH_DELAY);                                                                               \
00163             asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(_INDF1)                                );  /* ADC Mux --> Sensor           */  \
00164             asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_DACCON0))  ",5"                );  /* DAC Output Enable            */
00165     
00166     #else
00167     
00168         // Assumes: FSR0 is Sensor TRIS
00169         //          FSR1 is ADCON0
00170         //          DAC is also used as reference source
00171         #define CVD_RSCa_FSR0_FSR1ADC_gDAC(current_channel, pin)                                                        \
00172             asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_DACCON1)                              );  /*                              */  \
00173             asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(current_channel)                       );  /*                              */  \
00174             asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF0)    "," ___mkstr(pin)           );  /* Set the sensor to an input   */  \
00175             _NOP_DELAY(CVD_SWITCH_DELAY);                                                                               \
00176             asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(_INDF1)                                );  /* ADC Mux --> Sensor           */  \
00177             asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(CVD_GUARD_DACCON1_A)                   );  /*                              */  \
00178             asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_DACCON1))                      );  /* Adjust DAC Output Level      */  \
00179             asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_DACCON0))  ",5"                );  /* DAC Output Enable            */
00180             
00181         #define CVD_RSCb_FSR0_FSR1ADC_gDAC(current_channel, pin)                                                        \
00182             asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_DACCON1)                              );  /*                              */  \
00183             asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(current_channel)                       );  /*                              */  \
00184             asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF0)    "," ___mkstr(pin)           );  /* Set the sensor to an input   */  \
00185             _NOP_DELAY(CVD_SWITCH_DELAY);                                                                               \
00186             asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(_INDF1)                                );  /* ADC Mux --> Sensor           */  \
00187             asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(CVD_GUARD_DACCON1_B)                   );  /*                              */  \
00188             asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_DACCON1))                      );  /* Adjust DAC Output Level      */  \
00189             asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_DACCON0))  ",5"                );  /* DAC Output Enable            */
00190 
00191     #endif
00192 #endif
00193 
00194 
00195 // FSR0 = Sensor TRIS
00196 // FSR1 = ADCON0
00197 #define CVD_RSP_FSR0sTRIS_FSR1ADC0(sensorTris)                                              \
00198     asm("movlw LOW  "   ___mkstr(_ADCON0)           );  /*                              */  \
00199     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(_FSR1L)            );  /*                              */  \
00200     asm("movlw HIGH "   ___mkstr(_ADCON0)           );  /*                              */  \
00201     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(_FSR1H)            );  /*                              */  \
00202     asm("movlw LOW  "   ___mkstr(sensorTris)        );  /*                              */  \
00203     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(_FSR0L)            );  /*                              */  \
00204     asm("movlw HIGH "   ___mkstr(sensorTris)        );  /*                              */  \
00205     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(_FSR0H)            );  /*                              */  
00206     
00207 #define CVD_RSEa_FSR0CLR_mPORTSET_DAC(sensorLat, pin)                                                                                \
00208     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(sensorLat)                                                 );  /*                              */  \
00209     asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(sensorLat))  "," ___mkstr(pin)                      );  /* Set sensor LAT high          */  \
00210     asm("bcf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF0)        "," ___mkstr(pin)                           );  /* Set the sensor to an output  */  \
00211     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(PIC_DACOUT_LAT_ASM)                                        );  /*                              */  \
00212     asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(PIC_DACOUT_LAT_ASM)) "," ___mkstr(PIC_DACOUT_PIN)   );  /* Set DACOUT LAT high          */  \
00213     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_DACCON0)                                                  );  /*                              */  \
00214     asm("bcf        "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_DACCON0))       ",5"                               );  /* Turn off DAC output pin      */  
00215 
00216 #define CVD_RSEb_FSR0CLR_mPORTCLR_DAC(sensorLat, pin)                                                                                \
00217     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(sensorLat)                                                 );  /*                              */  \
00218     asm("bcf        "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(sensorLat))      "," ___mkstr(pin)                  );  /* Set sensor LAT low           */  \
00219     asm("bcf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF0)                 "," ___mkstr(pin)                  );  /* Set the sensor to an output  */  \
00220     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(PIC_DACOUT_LAT_ASM)                                        );  /*                              */  \
00221     asm("bcf        "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(PIC_DACOUT_LAT_ASM)) "," ___mkstr(PIC_DACOUT_PIN)   );  /* Set DACOUT LAT low           */  \
00222     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_DACCON0)                                                  );  /*                              */  \
00223     asm("bcf        "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_DACCON0))       ",5"                               );  /* Turn off DAC output pin      */  
00224     
00225 // EXCLUSIVELY MUTUAL SENSING
00226 #define CVD_RSC_FSR0_Input_Only(current_channel, pin)                                                   \
00227     asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF0)    "," ___mkstr(pin)   );  /* Set the sensor to an input   */  \
00228 
00229 // REFERENCE SOURCE - DAC
00230 #define CVD_RSIa_DAC_VDD()                                                                  \
00231     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_DACCON0)          );  /*                              */  \
00232     asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(PIC_DACCON0_VDD)   );  /*                              */  \
00233     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_DACCON0))  );  /* DACCON0 = PIC_DACCON0_VDD    */  \
00234     asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(PIC_DACCON1_VDD)   );  /*                              */  \
00235     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_DACCON1))  );  /* DACCON1 = PIC_DACCON1_VDD    */  
00236 #define CVD_RSIb_DAC_VSS()                                                                  \
00237     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_DACCON0)          );  /*                              */  \
00238     asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(PIC_DACCON0_VSS)   );  /*                              */  \
00239     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_DACCON0))  );  /* DACCON0 = PIC_DACCON0_VSS    */  \
00240     asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(PIC_DACCON1_VSS)   );  /*                              */  \
00241     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_DACCON1))  );  /* DACCON1 = PIC_DACCON1_VSS    */  
00242 #define CVD_RS_MUX_DAC()                                                            \
00243     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_ADCON0)               );  /*                  */  \
00244     asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(MTOUCH_SELECT_DAC_NOGO)   );  /*                  */  \
00245     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_ADCON0))       );  /* ADC Mux --> DAC  */    
00246 
00247 
00248 // REFERENCE SOURCE - IO
00249 #define CVD_RSIb_rLAT_CLR(sensorLat, ref_pin)                                                                                      \
00250     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(sensorLat)                          );  /*                              */   \
00251     asm("bcf        "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(sensorLat)) "," ___mkstr(ref_pin)    );  /* Clear the reference port bit */
00252 #define CVD_RSIa_rLAT_SET(sensorLat, ref_pin)                                                                                      \
00253     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(sensorLat)                          );  /*                              */   \
00254     asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(sensorLat)) "," ___mkstr(ref_pin)    );  /* Set the reference port bit   */
00255 #define CVD_RS_MUX_REF(ref_channel)                                                 \
00256     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_ADCON0)               );  /*                  */  \
00257     asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(ref_channel)           );  /*                  */  \
00258     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_ADCON0))       );  /* ADC Mux --> Ref  */ 
00259    
00260 #define CVD_RS_MUX_SENSOR(current_channel)                                              \
00261     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(_ADCON0)               );  /*                      */  \
00262     asm("movlw      "   ___mkstr(current_channel)       );  /*                      */  \
00263     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(_ADCON0))       );  /* ADC Mux --> Sensor   */    
00264    
00265 // GENERIC EXITING OPTIONS
00266 // Assumes: FSR0 is Sensor TRIS
00267 //          No Mutual Sensor
00268 //          No DACOUT Guard
00269 #define CVD_RSEa_FSR0_CLR_mPORTSET(sensorLat, pin)                                                               \
00270     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(sensorLat)                              );  /*                              */  \
00271     asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(sensorLat))  "," ___mkstr(pin)   );  /* Set sensor LAT high          */  \
00272     asm("bcf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF0)        "," ___mkstr(pin)   );  /* Set the sensor to an output  */
00273 #define CVD_RSEb_FSR0_CLR_mPORTCLR(sensorLat, pin)                                                               \
00274     asm("BANKSEL    "   ___mkstr(sensorLat)                              );  /*                              */  \
00275     asm("bcf        "   ___mkstr(NOBANK(sensorLat))  "," ___mkstr(pin)   );  /* Set sensor LAT low           */  \
00276     asm("bcf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF0)        "," ___mkstr(pin)   );  /* Set the sensor to an output  */
00277     
00278 // Assumes: FSR0 is Sensor TRIS
00279 //          FSR1 is Sensor LAT
00280 //          No Mutual Sensor
00281 //          No DACOUT Guard
00282 #define CVD_RSEa_FSR0_CLR_FSR1_SET(pin)                                                                 \
00283     asm("bsf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF1)    "," ___mkstr(pin)   );  /* Set sensor LAT high          */  \
00284     asm("bcf        "   ___mkstr(_INDF0)    "," ___mkstr(pin)   );  /* Set the sensor to an output  */
00285 #define CVD_RSEb_FSR0_CLR_FSR1_CLR(pin)                                                                 \
00286     asm("bcf        "  ___mkstr(_INDF1)     "," ___mkstr(pin)   );  /* Set sensor LAT low           */  \
00287     asm("bcf        "  ___mkstr(_INDF0)     "," ___mkstr(pin)   );  /* Set the sensor to an output  */
00288     
00289 
00290 
00291 // PREPARE FOR CONNECTION
00292     
00293 // FSR0 = Sensor TRIS
00294 // FSR1 = Sensor LAT
00295 #define CVD_RSP_FSR0_sTRIS_FSR1_sLAT(sensorLat, sensorTris)                                 \
00296     asm("movlw LOW  "   ___mkstr(sensorLat)         );  /*                              */  \
00297     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(_FSR1L)            );  /*                              */  \
00298     asm("movlw HIGH "   ___mkstr(sensorLat)         );  /*                              */  \
00299     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(_FSR1H)            );  /*                              */  \
00300     asm("movlw LOW  "   ___mkstr(sensorTris)        );  /*                              */  \
00301     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(_FSR0L)            );  /*                              */  \
00302     asm("movlw HIGH "   ___mkstr(sensorTris)        );  /*                              */  \
00303     asm("movwf      "   ___mkstr(_FSR0H)            );  /*                              */  
00304

00319 // MUTUAL SENSOR
00320 #if defined(CVD_MUTUAL_ENABLED)
00321     #define CVD_RS_MUTUAL_A(index)                              CVD_MUTUAL_LAT = 0
00322     #define CVD_RS_MUTUAL_B(index)                              CVD_MUTUAL_LAT = 1
00323 #elif defined(CVD_MUTUAL_EXCLUSIVE_ENABLED)
00324     #define CVD_RS_MUTUAL_A(index)                              CVD_MUTUAL_LAT = 1
00325     #define CVD_RS_MUTUAL_B(index)                              CVD_MUTUAL_LAT = 0
00326 #else
00327     #define CVD_RS_MUTUAL_A(index)                               
00328     #define CVD_RS_MUTUAL_B(index)                         
00329 #endif
00330 
00331 // ACTIVE SCANNING - ENTER, and REFERENCE
00332 #if defined(CVD_MUTUAL_EXCLUSIVE_ENABLED)
00333     #define CVD_RS_INIT_A(indexRef)                        
00334     #define CVD_RS_INIT_B(indexRef)                        
00335     #define CVD_RS_MUXSELECT(index, indexRef)                   CVD_RS_MUX_SENSOR(MTOUCH_SELECT_SENSOR(index))
00336 #else
00337     #if defined(CVD_FORCE_REF_DAC) || (MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS == 1)
00338         #if defined(MTOUCH_AD_DAC_NOGO) 
00339             #define CVD_RS_INIT_A(indexRef)                     CVD_RSIa_DAC_VDD()
00340             #define CVD_RS_INIT_B(indexRef)                     CVD_RSIb_DAC_VSS()
00341             #define CVD_RS_MUXSELECT(index, indexRef)           CVD_RS_MUX_DAC()
00342         #else
00343             #if defined(CVD_FORCE_REF_DAC)
00344                 #warning This part does not have a DAC.         CVD_FORCE_REF_DAC is being ignored.
00345                 #define CVD_RS_INIT_A(indexRef)                 CVD_RSIa_rLAT_SET(MTOUCH_LAT_ASM_SENSOR(indexRef), MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(indexRef)) 
00346                 #define CVD_RS_INIT_B(indexRef)                 CVD_RSIb_rLAT_CLR(MTOUCH_LAT_ASM_SENSOR(indexRef), MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(indexRef)) 
00347                 #define CVD_RS_MUXSELECT(index, indexRef)       CVD_RS_MUX_REF(MTOUCH_SELECT_SENSOR(indexRef))
00348             #elif (MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS == 1)
00349                 #error The mTouch Framework requires a DAC mux option on the ADC in order to scan only one sensor but this part does not have a DAC.
00350             #endif
00351         #endif
00352     #else
00353         #define CVD_RS_INIT_A(indexRef)                         CVD_RSIa_rLAT_SET(MTOUCH_LAT_ASM_SENSOR(indexRef), MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(indexRef)) 
00354         #define CVD_RS_INIT_B(indexRef)                         CVD_RSIb_rLAT_CLR(MTOUCH_LAT_ASM_SENSOR(indexRef), MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(indexRef)) 
00355         #define CVD_RS_MUXSELECT(index, indexRef)               CVD_RS_MUX_REF(MTOUCH_SELECT_SENSOR(indexRef))
00356     #endif
00357 #endif
00358 
00359 // ACTIVE SCANNING - CONNECTION, CONVERSION, and EXIT
